mapper.select: select m.imedia, p.pic, m.title, m.date, if(m.is_saw = 1, m.star, NULL) as star from t_media m join t_media_pics p ON p.imedia = m.imedia where m.date = #{date} and m.iuser = #{iuser} and m.del = 0 GROUP BY p.imedia

select m.imedia, m.title, m.date, p.pic, if(m.is_saw = 1, m.star, NULL) as star from t_media m join t_media_pics p ON m.imedia = p.imedia where m.is_saw = #{isSaw} and m.iuser = #{iuser} and m.del = 0 GROUP BY m.imedia
SELECT p.pic from t_media m join t_media_pics p ON p.imedia = m.imedia where m.imedia = #{imedia} and m.del = 0
